name: cinemas
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool argentina_movie_theatres.
Tool description: This api will give you data about the movies and showtimes of the 3 main theatre chains in Argentina
API description: Fetches a list of cinemas based on the specified brand using the RapidAPI service.

brand.description: The brand of the cinema to filter the results. Default is 'hoyts'.
